title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 154-3.1 - Scope of Subpart and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 154-3.1 - Scope of Subpart and applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart shall apply to students
with disabilities who are subject to the initial and reentry process and
determination of English proficiency pursuant to section
154-2.3
(a) of this

Part and the exit procedures pursuant to section
154-2.3
(m) of this

Part in programs operated beginning with the 2015-2016 school year and
thereafter. Except as otherwise provided in this Subpart. all other provisions
of Subpart 154-2 of this Part shall apply to students with disabilities who are

English Language Learners in programs operated beginning with the 2015-2016
school year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
154-3.1

Adopted, New

York State Register December 3, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 48, eff. 12/3/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
